Explore the underlined  🖥️ links 🔗 below 👇🏻 to learn more about me! 😉

---

[Jesus](https://youtu.be/KBF0NJ1EPXk "Marked|Savage Jesus|Pastor Michael Todd") is 1st ☝🏻 • 💁🏼[Wifey](https://youtu.be/t9YOozUb0vg "Wifey") + 🧒🏻[Lucy Girl](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMkjdhVdg7I "Lucy-Dancing") + 👶🏻[Wynnie Girl](https://youtu.be/dHBaXWsh8IU "Big Sis Meets Little Sis") come 2nd ✌🏻• 🙋🏻‍♂️Then, me! 

---

### What are you passionate about, Tico? 
- I love 🤩[solving problems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/How_to_Solve_It "Polyas") 🤔🧩, but I LOVE 🥰*__PEOPLE__* 👥 more!

### Why do you love 'people' so much? 
- Well, because ☝🏻God loved me [FIRST](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k2iHNzNJkJw "FIRST")🙏🏻 & because He gave me an [ENFJ-T](https://www.16personalities.com/enfj-personality "Protagonist") personality type 😅.

### So why do you love 'solving problems'?
- __ALL__ 'problems' affect __REAL__ people 😞, so *SOLVING* them is just ☝🏻one way that I get to [help](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zcruIov45bI "Helping Others Video") 🤗others while showing God how 🙏🏻grateful I am for helping __ME__ solve *__MY__* problems 🤷🏻‍♂️.

### Where have you solved problems?
- In the [PT clinic](https://res.cloudinary.com/tico-cloudinary/image/upload/v1565150347/Portfolio/therapy_pitmji.jpg "PT-Clinic") 🤕, in the [weight room](https://youtu.be/VMKQ6VuJBno "weight-room") 🏋🏻, at  [Church](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/elkton-missionary-church_jesus-god-elkton-activity-6554791593495322624-J0XW "EMC") ⛪, on the basketball [court](https://youtu.be/1s9HIODLhio "dunk") ⛹🏻, in the [classroom](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=erWWTNtskSw "Queue-tutorial") 👨🏻‍🎓, & even [outside](https://youtu.be/boLvDmxVj4U "outside") 🏌🏻, __BUT__ more recently, in my [code](https://youtu.be/masJin41ae8?t=154 "lambda-showcase") 💻🤓.
